metadata.title: CVE-2022-28201 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.6, 1.36.x before 1.36.4,and 1.37.x before 1.37.2. Users with the editinterface permission cantrigger infinite recursion, because a bare local interwiki is mishandledfor the mainpage message.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
